  • Method Details

    • index

      @GetMapping("/users") public java.util.List<User> index()
      GET endpoint to /users Sets the state of a particular opening during the simulation.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the opening.
      state - The state to set the opening to.
      Returns:
      The response status of the operation.

    • update

      @PostMapping("/user/update") public net.minidev.json.JSONObject update​(@RequestParam("id") java.lang.Long id, @RequestParam(value="home_id",required=false) java.lang.Long homeId, @RequestParam(value="zone_id",required=false) java.lang.Long zoneId, @RequestParam(value="name",required=false) java.lang.String name, @RequestParam(value="email",required=false) java.lang.String email, @RequestParam(value="password",required=false) java.lang.String password)
      POST endpoint to /user/update Updates user information.
      Parameters:
      id - User Entity ID
      homeId - Home Entity ID
      zoneId - Zone Entity ID
      name - User's name to be updated to
      email - User's email to be updated to
      password - User's password to be updated to
      Returns:
      Returns a JSON status object based on the operation status.

    • show

      @GetMapping("/user") public User show​(@RequestParam("id") java.lang.Long id)
      GET endpoint to /user Finds user and retrieves user data based on ID.
      Parameters:
      id - User ID
      Returns:
      Returns the User data

    • getUser

      @GetMapping("/user/login") public User getUser​(@RequestParam("email") java.lang.String email, @RequestParam("password") java.lang.String password)
      GET endpoint to /user/login Gets user by email and password
      Parameters:
      email - User's email
      password - User's password
      Returns:
      Returns the User data

    • currentUser

      @GetMapping("/user/current") public User currentUser()

      Returns:

    • store

      @PostMapping("/user/store") public net.minidev.json.JSONObject store​(@RequestParam("name") java.lang.String name, @RequestParam("email") java.lang.String email, @RequestParam("password") java.lang.String password, @RequestParam("isParent") java.lang.Boolean isParent, @RequestParam("isChild") java.lang.Boolean isChild, @RequestParam("isGuest") java.lang.Boolean isGuest)
      POST endpoint to /user/store Signs a User entity up.
      Parameters:
      name - User's name
      email - User's email
      password - User's password
      isParent - Boolean if the User's type is parent
      isChild - Boolean if the User's type is child
      isGuest - Boolean if the User's type is guest
      Returns:
      Returns a JSON status object based on the operation status.
